H0.text: Carbon monoxide is a common air pollutant released when driving a car.

H1.text: Chlorine is a common air pollutant released when driving a car.

H2.text: Nitrogen is a common air pollutant released when driving a car, an activity that causes the release of air pollutants.

H3.text: Iron oxide is a common air pollutant released when driving a car.

A4.text: Carbon monoxide is a temporary atmospheric pollutant in some urban areas, chiefly from the exhaust of internal combustion engines (including vehicles, portable and back-up generators, lawnmowers, power washers, etc.).

A5.text: Urban pollution Carbon monoxide is a temporary atmospheric pollutant in some urban areas, chiefly from the exhaust of internal combustion engines (including vehicles, portable and back-up generators, lawnmowers, power washers, etc.).
